Primary Contact: Mona Hennenfent, BPE, Chief Executive Officer
Volunteer Coordinator: Magda Kapp, Director of Communications & Prevention Services; Email: mkapp@braintrustcanada.com
Service Details: - Provides direct service to adults with brain injury and their families through support and education - Strong focus on injury prevention initiatives with a specific focus on targeting youth who are at the highest risk of injury - Support services include residential, pre-employment, health maintenance, education, financial management, compensatory strategy development, advocacy, and family support - Support services are provided on a one-to-one basis or in a group format
